title: 关于莫名崩溃的问题
txt_content:
请问，minecraft这样崩溃是什么？正版试过，盗版也试过。进游戏OK，不能进世界，不能进服务器。下面是错误报告：
[22:54:12] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: SkyiAnthony     
[22:54:12] [Client thread/INFO]: (Session ID is token:7e889788e164da8d73db4d95b9692a6b:7e889788e164da8d73db4d95b9692a6b)     
[22:54:13] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4 
[22:54:15] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default     
[22:54:17] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...     
[22:54:17] [Thread-6/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL 
[22:54:17] [Thread-6/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see http://www.lwjgl.org)     
[22:54:17] [Thread-6/INFO]: OpenAL initialized. 
[22:54:18] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started     
[22:54:19] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 512x512 textures-atlas     
[22:54:27] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting integrated minecraft server version 1.8.9     
[22:54:27] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair 
[22:54:28] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for level 0     
[22:54:28] [Server thread/INFO]: Changing view distance to 12, from 10     
[22:54:30] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server 
[22:54:30] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving players     
[22:54:30] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving worlds 
[22:54:30] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Overworld     
[22:54:30] [Client thread/FATAL]: Reported exception thrown!

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content: 尝试材质包更改为默认

浅念哥 发表于 2017-1-27 23:31
尝试材质包更改为默认
没有材质包。完全纯净

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
1572714556 发表于 2017-1-27 23:33
没有材质包。完全纯净
看到了512x512 textures-atlas
提示的大概意思就是显存溢出
目测是启动器造成的
更换启动器即可
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-633276-1-1.html
无耻的宣传我的垃圾启动器

replies.author: ff98sha
replies.txt_content: 貌似是 io.netty.channel.ChannelException引起的，尝试重新下载相关附件（netty等）

replies.author: GreyElaina
replies.txt_content: 应该是显卡原因或者显卡驱动的原因
